r.d: Provides bindings to the functions of libssh2 which implements the SSH2 protocol. libssh2 is available from http://www.sourceforge.net/projects/libssh2
r.n: Minor fixes including some added error handling and more discriptive ./configure message. Users of PHP/SSH2 are recommended to upgrade their installation of libssh2 to version 0.6 whether or not upgrading the PHP/SSH2 extension.
